long_description: Offering high breathability, wind protection, and a huge range of motion when cross-country skiing, our REI Winterflyte men's jacket makes it easy to pick up the pace on your favorite winter trails. Smooth fabric repels wind, breathes well and provides the comfort of 4-way stretch, and it features a Durable Water Repellent finish to fend off light moisture. Fabric also resists abrasion and pilling so it will look great for seasons to come. Stretchy underarm, side, and upper back panels enhance mobility and breathability. Zippered handwarmer pockets and 2 internal drop-in pockets securely store necessities; headphone port makes it easy to listen to tunes. Back zippered pocket is perfect for stowing bulky essentials such as gloves or a hat. Cuffs feature internal gussets to seal in warmth. Active fit offers a contoured cut with strategically placed seams so that the top moves with the body for a full range of motion. The REI Winterflyte men's jacket also features reflective detailing to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: Offering high breathability, wind protection, and a huge range of motion when cross-country skiing, our REI Winterflyte men's jacket makes it easy to pick up the pace on your favorite winter trails.
